dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
Pure-Python implementation of ASN.1 types and DER/BER/CER codecs
(X.208).
dependencies.name: py-pyasn1

dependencies.description:
High-level wrapper around a subset of the OpenSSL library. Note: The
Python Cryptographic Authority strongly suggests the use of
pyca/cryptography where possible. If you are using pyOpenSSL for
anything other than making a TLS connection you should move to
cryptography and drop your pyOpenSSL dependency.
dependencies.name: py-pyopenssl

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The azureml-core contains functionality for creating and managing: *
Azure Machine Learning workspaces, experiments and runs; * Machine
learning compute respources; * Models, images and web services.
dependent_to.name: py-azureml-core

description: Provides enhanced HTTPS support for httplib and urllib2 using PyOpenSSL.
name: py-ndg-httpsclient

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
